original_text: I had to explain to a judge that I had not done anything wrong. The first time I did that, nobody helped me. All my friends stayed away. I pray that God will forgive them for that.
korean_text: 내가 처음 변명할 때에 나와 함께 한 자가 하나도 없고 다 나를 버렸으나 그들에게 허물을 돌리지 않기를 원하노라

sentences.original_text: I had to explain to a judge
that I had not done anything wrong
The first time I did that
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 그렇게 한 첫 번째 때

sentences.original_text: I pray that God will forgive them
